did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Jacob H. Nelson Store Account Books 1916-1922

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jacob H. Nelson Store Account Books, Accession # 1996.3, Special Collections, Kegley Library, Wytheville Community College, Wytheville, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Anonymously donated in June 1996 in honor of WCC President William F. Snyder.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Jacob H. Nelson, a charter member of the Max Meadows Chamber of Commerce, owned the Max Meadows Grocery during the early twentieth century. Nelson also worked as a foreman for the Virginia Iron, Coal, and Coke Company. He also was a member of the Wythe County Board of Supervisors.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Account book I covers Septmber 1916 through August 1917 and is 549 pages, excluding the index. Account Book II covers July 1920 through May 1921 and is 548 numbered pages, and three unnumbered pages, excluding the index. Account Book III covers March 1922 through December 1922 and has 548 numbered pages and three unnumbered pages, excluding the index.
